article: My name is Nick Vujicic, an Australian who was born without any limbs . In recent years one of my most _ videos on YouTube shows my skateboarding, surfing, playing music, and best of all, _ hugs from all fields of great people. All in all, those are pretty ordinary _ that just about anyone can do, right? So _ do you think that video has been viewed millions of times? My theory is that people are _ to watch it because in spite of my physical limitations, I'm living as though I had no limits. People often think someone _ a severe disability to be inactive, upset, maybe even crazy. But I'd like to _ them by showing that I lead a very adventurous and fruitful life Among the hundreds of _ on that video, here's one typical remark:"Seeing a guy like this being happy makes me wonder why I feel _ for myself sometimes -or feel not funny enough, or whatever. How can I _ think thoughts like that when this guy is living without limbs and still being happy!?" I found happiness when I realized that imperfect _ I may be, I am the perfect Nick Vujicic. I'm designed according to God's plan. That's not to say that there isn't _ for improvement. I'm always trying to be better so I can better _ the world! I do believe my life has no _ . I want you all to feel the same way about your life, no matter what your challenges may be. As we _ our journey together, please take a moment to _ about any limitations you've placed on your life. Now think about what _ would be like to be _ of those limitations. What would your life be if anything were possible?
